page.title: 07Events
page.content: There is a regular pattern each year, when all groups promote membership and raise funds. 1.The Primary School has a wide range of extra curricular activities and is also involved in community functions. 2.The Horticultural Society Annual Show in summer,is the major event involving every club and society with side shows, floats,sports,demonstrations,craft, flower and vegetable exhibits.It also includes other local villages. 3.The Community Council co-ordinates and promotes events providing financial support to clubs etc.It organizes the Harvest Horkey,Firework Display etc. 4Church and Chapels keep traditional religious festivals, hold fund raising events & celebrate anniversaries. 5All Sports Clubs use the M.S.C.for presentations,fund raising and dinner/dances.
